    • Method Detail

      • setControlsEnabled

        protected void setControlsEnabled(boolean enable)
        Enable/disable the script manager dialog menu controls
        Overrides:
        setControlsEnabled in class CcddFrameHandler
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable the controls; false to disable

      • doAssnUpdatesComplete

        protected void doAssnUpdatesComplete(boolean commandError)
        Perform the steps needed following execution of script association updates to the database
        Parameters:
        commandError - false if the database commands successfully completed; true if an error occurred and the changes were not made

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        Create the script association manager dialog. This is executed in a separate thread since it can take a noticeable amount time to complete, and by using a separate thread the GUI is allowed to continue to update. The GUI menu commands, however, are disabled until the telemetry scheduler initialization completes execution

      • createScriptSelectionPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel createScriptSelectionPanel()
        Create the script selection panel
        Returns:
        JPanel containing the script selection panel

      • createSelectionPanel

        private javax.swing.JPanel createSelectionPanel(java.lang.String labelText,
                                                int tableSelect)
        Create the table tree selection panel
        Parameters:
        labelText - label to display above the table tree
        tableSelect - table tree item selection model
        Returns:
        JPanel containing the selection panel

      • addAssociation

        private boolean addAssociation(CcddConstants.TableInsertionPoint insertPoint,
                               int ignoreRow)
        Add an association to the script associations list based on the script and table selections
        Parameters:
        insertPoint - insertion point for the added row into the associations table: TableInsertionPoint.START to insert as the first row in the table, TableInsertionPoint.SELECTION to insert below the currently selected row, or TableInsertionPoint.END to insert as the last row in the table
        ignoreRow - row to ignore when checking for an identical, existing association (as is possible when replacing an association, if no changes are made); -1 to prevent a duplicate association (as when adding an association)
        Returns:
        true if the association inputs are valid and the association is successfully added

      • removeAssociations

        private void removeAssociations()
        Remove the selected association(s) from the script associations table

      • replaceAssociation

        private void replaceAssociation()
        Replace the selected association in the script associations table

      • createAssociationsFromTable

        private java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> createAssociationsFromTable()
        Create the script association definitions from the script association table
        Returns:
        List containing the script associations

      • isAssociationsChanged

        protected boolean isAssociationsChanged()
        Check if the script associations have changed
        Returns:
        true if a change exists

      • reloadAssociationsTable

        protected void reloadAssociationsTable()
        Update the table tree and the associations table with the latest table and script associations information
